turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Naxal (film).
turn.1: What is known about the film Naxal?
turn.2: Naxal (film)  Naxal (Bengali: নকশাল) (English: Naxalite) is a 2015 Bengali-language Indian feature film directed by Debaditya Bandyopadhyay, starring Mithun Chakraborty and Dhritiman Chatterjee in pivotal roles.
turn.3: What happened in the shooting of the film?
turn.4: The backdrop of the film is the Naxal Amol or Naxal Period.
turn.6: It was a period in the history of the state of West Bengal that began with the infiltration of the ideas of the socialist movements in the western world (especially Latin America) into the psyche of many Bengali youths.
turn.7: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.8: Mithun Chakraborty plays the lead role in this film as a Naxalite.
turn.9: What happens with Chakraborty's character in the film?
turn.10: The story opens on the 21st day of May 1971 with the escaping of a few Naxalite youths.
turn.11: Which other names were worth mentioning in the film?
turn.12: The most prominent among them is Anirban Sen.
